title: Broken with pycodestyle 2.1 due to the new attribute previous_unindented_logical_line
body:
In GitLab by @yan12125 on Nov 6, 2016, 07:12

*Please provide the following version information*

- Arch Linux
- CPython 3.5.2
- setuptools 28.7.1
- flake8 9553c8d8ccf54221153f498e28297d9cc74ca12d, with the patch at https://github.com/PyCQA/flake8/pull/7, pycodestyle 2.1.0 installed with pip

*Please describe the problem or feature*

PS. I know ```setup.py``` of flake8 depends pycodestyle < 2.1.0. But 2.1.0 compatibility should be landed sooner or later, right?

In https://github.com/PyCQA/pycodestyle/commit/6b75c4de380c5e786d277851a7da8a581da53bcb and later https://github.com/PyCQA/pycodestyle/commit/2a5e575611674b0d202c5ea0322fce23718d6e02, ```blank_lines``` plugin of pycodestyle introduces a new variable ```previous_unindented_logical_line```, causing the following error:
```
$ flake8 -j1
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 449, in run_check
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/processor.py", line 235, in keyword_arguments_for
AttributeError: 'FileProcessor' object has no attribute 'previous_unindented_logical_line'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yen/.local/bin/flake8", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('flake8==3.1.0.dev0', 'console_scripts', 'flake8')()
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/main/cli.py", line 16, in main
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/main/application.py", line 316, in run
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/main/application.py", line 300, in _run
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/main/application.py", line 238, in run_checks
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 343, in run
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 327, in run_serial
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 595, in run_checks
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 579, in process_tokens
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 629, in handle_newline
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 530, in run_logical_checks
  File "/home/yen/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/flake8-3.1.0.dev0-py3.5.egg/flake8/checker.py", line 455, in run_check
flake8.exceptions.PluginRequestedUnknownParameters: "pycodestyle" requested unknown parameters causing 'FileProcessor' object has no attribute 'previous_unindented_logical_line'
```
